questions.question_text: Satpuruṣhno je prasang e ja _____ viṣhe draḍh _____ thavānu kāraṇ chhe.
questions.explanation: This is a direct quote from Vachanamrut Gadhada Paschim 44.

questions.question_text: Āvā Sādhune manmā sambhārīe to mannā pāp baḷī jāy ne vātu sāmbhaḷīe to kānnā pāp baḷī jāy ne darshan karīe to ānkhnā pāp baḷī jāy, em mahimā jāṇavo.
questions.explanation: The provided quotation is a direct quote from Swamini Vato 1/30.

questions.question_text: Jevī parokṣh devne viṣhe jīvne pratīti chhe tevī jo pratyakṣh _____ Harine viṣhe āve, to jeṭalā arth prāpt thavānā kahyā chhe teṭalā sarve arth tene prāpt thāy chhe.
questions.explanation: The verbatim quote is from Vachanamrut Gadhada Antya 2.

questions.question_text: Yasya deve parābhaktir, yathā deve tathā gurau | Tasyaite kathitā hyarthāhā, prakāshante mahātmanaha ||
questions.explanation: This shloka is from Shvetashvatar Upanishad.

questions.question_text: jene niṣhkāmī vartamān draḍh hoy to te thakī ame hajār gāu chheṭe jaīe to paṇ tenī pāse ja chhīe; ane jene te niṣhkāmī vartamānmā kāchyap chhe ne te jo amārī pāse rahe chhe toy paṇ te lākh gāu chheṭe chhe. Ane amane niṣhkāmī bhakta hoy tenā ja hāthnī karī sevā game chhe.
questions.explanation: This is a direct quote from Vachanamrut Gadhada Madhya 33.

questions.question_text: Avani par āvī vahāle _____ sthāpyo, Harijanone kol, kalyāṇno āpyo rāj...
questions.explanation: This line is from the kirtan by Sadguru Premanand Swami.

questions.question_text: _____ dekhīne bhāīo, chheṭerā chāle, Paḍī vastu koīnī, hāthe nav jhāle rāj...
questions.explanation: This line is from the kirtan by Sadguru Premanand Swami.

questions.question_text: Pragaṭ Prabhunu nām, Sahajānand Swāmī rāj...
questions.explanation: This line is from a kirtan by Sadguru Premanand Swami.

questions.question_text: Nirvikalp uttam ati, nischay tav _____; Māhātmya-gnān-yukt bhakti tav, ekāntik sukh ḍhām.
questions.explanation: This is a quote from a kirtan by Sadguru Premanand Swami.

questions.question_text: Mohime tav bhaktapano, tāme koī prakār; Dosh na rahe koī jātko, suniyo Dharmakumār.
questions.explanation: This is a quote from a kirtan by Sadguru Premanand Swami.

questions.question_text: kāntik tav dāsko, dīje _____ moy.
questions.explanation: This is a quote from a kirtan by Sadguru Premanand Swami.

questions.question_text: Ehī (vidhi) dharmake niyamme, barto sab haridās; Bhajo Shrī Sahajānandpad, chhoḍi aur sab ās.
questions.explanation: This is a quote from a kirtan by Sadguru Premanand Swami.

questions.question_text: Ane e Bhagwān āpaṇne _____ besāḍe to hāthīe besīne rājī rahevu ane gadheḍe besāḍe to gadheḍe besīne rājī rahevu.
questions.explanation: This is a quote from Vachanamrut Gadhada Paschim 74.

questions.question_text: Jo mār mār karato koī āvato hoy to em samajavu je, ‘Mārā Swāmīnu ja karyu sarve thāy chhe, paṇ te vinā koīnu halāvyu pānaḍu paṇ halatu nathī.’
questions.explanation: The provided quotation is a direct quote from Swamini Vato 1/88.

questions.question_text: Bhagwān to potānā bhaktanī _____ karavāmā ja beṭhā chhe. Kenī peṭhe? To jem pāpaṇ ānkhanī rakṣhā kare chhe ne hāth kanṭhanī rakṣhā kare chhe ne māvatar chhokarānī rakṣhā kare chhe ne rājā prajānī rakṣhāmā chhe, tem ja Bhagwān āpaṇī rakṣhāmā chhe.
questions.explanation: This is a quote from Swamini Vato 1/22.

questions.question_text: āpaṇe jyāre tan-man-dhan Bhagwānne arpaṇ karyu tyāre have Bhagwānnī ichchhā te ja āpaṇu prārabdha chhe, te vinā bīju koī prārabdha nathī. Māṭe Bhagwānnī ichchhāe karīne game tevu sukh-dukh āve, temā koī rīte akaḷāī javu nahī
questions.explanation: This is a quote from Vachanamrut Gadhada Antya 13.

questions.question_text: Te kahyu chhe je, Dāsnā dushman Hari ke’dī hoy nahi, jem karashe tem _____ ja thāshe.
questions.explanation: This is a quote from Swamini Vato 1/148.

questions.question_text: je je mārā kahevāyā chho temā māre ek talmātra kasar rahevā devī nathī. Māțe tame pan sūdhā sāvadhān rahejyo; jo jarāy gāfalāī rākhasho to tamāro pag takashe nahī. Ane māre to je tame Bhagwānnā bhakta chho tenā hrudaymā koī jātnī vāsanā tathā koī jātno ayogya swabhāv te rahevā devo nathī.
questions.explanation: This is a quote from Vachanamrut Gadhada Madhya 45.

questions.question_text: Nahi to tame nachint rahejyo, karavu tamāre kāī nathī; Je malyā chhe tamane, te pār chhe _____.
questions.explanation: This is a quote from Bhaktachintamani 76/39-41.

questions.question_text: Te Bhagwānno jene pratyaksh pramān dradh āsharo hoy tene manmā evī bīk na rākhavī je, 'Hu rakhe marine bhūt-pret thau ke rakhe Indralokne ja pāmu ke rakhe Brahmalokne ja pāmu!' Evī āshankā manmā rākhavī nahī; kem je, je evo Bhagwānno bhakta hoy te to Bhagwānnā dhāmne ja pāme pan vachmā kyāy tene Bhagwān rahevā de nahī.
questions.explanation: This is a quote from Vachanamrut Gadhada Antya 7.
